mapper.select: select substr(l_Time, 6, 11) as 'l_Time2', l_Remain, l_Empty from LogData where d_No = #{d_No} order by l_Time desc limit 1;
select substr(l_Time, 6, 5) as 'l_Time2', sum(l_Eat) as 'l_Eat', sum(l_Amount) as 'l_Amount' from LogData where d_No = #{d_No} group by l_Time2 order by l_Time2 desc limit 20;
